channel.title: Getting revenge
channel.description:
If someone has ever done something to you in the past and you really hate them for it. I have a brand spanking new solution. First of all you will need the following:
A very powerful magnet, that can approx lift upto 10-20 pounds of weight. The credit card of a person you want to get revenge on.
Then you sneak out one of there most used credit cards from there wallet/purse. Next you grab the magnet and slowly swipe it across the magnetic strip on the credit card. It has to touch all of the strip to work. After you have swiped the magnet across the magnetic black/white strip on the credit card you repeat this process 2-3 times.
After you have done all of the above, return the credit card(s) to the wallet/ purse from were it came. Then wait till they go shopping and have no cash, and bam! The memory of the credit card will be erased, due to the powerful magnet obsfucting the strip.
Have fun with this :)
As seen on Mythbusters.

item.title: Getting revenge
item.dc:creator: @Blackester Blackester
item.description:

[/quote]

My friend bought two of those magnets and broke 3 fingers… LOL[/quote]

that made me lol in RL

item.title: Getting revenge
item.dc:creator: @Erj Erj
item.description:
@Erj wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:2, topic:19278”]uh, wouldnt it be easier just to kill them rather than steal their CC?

and wtf is your sig meant to do, not compile?[/quote]
Well this is clearly a better way then killing because

  1. It wont be in your conciounce
    2)The police cant find shit on you.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting revenge
item.dc:creator: @bigmac bigmac
item.description:
@bigmac wrote:

It’s not ment for people that you don’t keep in contact with or anything, but if your one of your family does something, you can get your own back

My sig is a load of mumbo jumbo from a random source
